mapper.select: select rr.pay_num payNum, r.room_rank_name || ' | ' || r.bed_cnt || ' ' || r.bed_name || ' | ' || r.view_name roomInfo, to_char(rr.checkin, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkIn, to_char(rr.checkout, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkOut from room_reservation rr inner join room r on r.room_id = rr.room_id where rr.user_id = #{userId} and rr.room_res_status = 'RESERVED' and rr.checkin <= add_months(sysdate, 3) order by rr.pay_num

select rr.room_res_status roomResStatus, r.room_rank_name || ' | ' || r.bed_cnt || ' ' || r.bed_name || ' | ' || r.view_name roomInfo, rr.adults_num adultsNum, rr.kids_num kidsNum, rr.pay_num payNum, to_char(rr.checkin, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkIn, to_char(rr.checkout, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkOut from room_reservation rr inner join room r on r.room_id = rr.room_id where rr.user_id = #{userId}
and rr.room_res_status = 'RESERVED'
and rr.room_res_status = 'CANCELED'
and rr.room_res_status in ('RESERVED', 'CANCELED')
and rr.checkin >= to_date(sysdate) and rr.checkin <= to_date(add_months(sysdate, 3))
and rr.checkin >= to_date(#{searchDataBeginDe}) and rr.checkin <= to_date(#{searchDataEndDe})
order by rr.pay_num

select r.room_rank_name || ' | ' || r.bed_cnt || ' ' || r.bed_name || ' | ' || r.view_name roomInfo, rr.pay_num payNum, rr.room_res_status roomResStatus, to_char(rr.checkin, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkIn, to_char(rr.checkout, 'yyyy.mm.dd') checkOut, rr.adults_num adultsNum, rr.kids_num kidsNum, to_char(rr.room_res_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd') roomResDate, p.pay_price payPrice, p.pay_price-r.room_basic_price addPrice, r.room_basic_price roomBasicPrice, m.eng_fname || ' ' || m.eng_lname engName, m.eng_fname engFName, m.eng_lname engLName, rr.guest_phone guestPhone, rr.guest_email guestEmail, c.code_name cardName, p.card_num cardNum from room_reservation rr inner join room r on r.room_id = rr.room_id inner join member m on m.member_id = rr.user_id inner join pay p on p.pay_num = rr.pay_num inner join common_code c on substr(card_code, 0, instr(card_code, '_')-1) = c.code_type and substr(p.card_code, instr(p.card_code, '_')+1) = c.code_val where rr.pay_num = #{payNum}
